text: @realDonaldTrump The Confederacy is not our heritage, you are thinking of Americans. The Confederacy only lasted 4 years, so it's not our history considering we are a nation of over 200 years old. It definitely doesn't symbolize greatness. We were never more divided. Try battling Covid19 instead
